AD_LoverInspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_LoverInspection.how_to_trigger: Click on the character as they're being inspected

FlamingFist_006.synopsis: Flaming Fist Cyril is an elf who feels things deeply. An emotive person, he is positive and tries to see the good in everything.  This dialogue contains several states, including resting, on high alert against ghouls, under attack etc..

AD_BrotherInspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_BrotherInspection.how_to_trigger: Click on the character when they're being inspected

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick.synopsis: Florrick and Vidor are talking between themselves about how to proceed. Florrick wants to wait until Mart Cullagh is awake and can tell them more about the shadowcurse. Vidor wants to plan an attack on Moonrise Towers to rescue Grand Duke Ravengard. They aren't at cross purposes, but they don't agree on much.

AD_WulbrenInspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_WulbrenInspection.how_to_trigger: Click on this character as they're being inspected

FlirtyTiefling.synopsis: Lakrissa's dialogue after her reunion scene with alfira (or potentially this is her only scene if alfira is dead). Lakrissa is usually playful and flirty but she is a but more restrained here. Still smiling but more somber.
FlirtyTiefling.how_to_trigger: save lakrissa and the other tieflings from moonrise in the jailbreak situation - this will trigger in last light

Manip.synopsis: The Flaming FIst Manip, Vidor, has conflict with Florrick prior to any of these dialogues. He is the sergeant of the FF troops, and believes Florrick is a terrible leader. Player can respond to his idea that he should attack Moonrise.
Manip.how_to_trigger: In debug book, teleport to Act 2/ haven, and select ' Act 2 setup,' 'Tiefling path'.Go into the Flaming Fist war room (inside the inn, first door on the right, and approach Florrick. After her defautl dialogue, approach the Manip behind her, next to Art Cullagh

AD_SisterInspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_SisterInspection.how_to_trigger: Click on the character as they're being inspected.

FlamingFist_001.synopsis: Thadwick is a male dwarf and grumpy is his middle name. He's a bit rough and gruff and has little time for the player - an amateur in his eyes. He warms up to him slightly as we progress through the dialogue. This dialogue cover his major states in Haven.

AD_FlirtyInspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_FlirtyInspection.how_to_trigger: click on the character as they're being inspected

FlamingFist_002.synopsis: Flaming Fist Aubree is devoted to the Ravengard but also pragmatic. She's unafraid of asking for the player's help and is concerned for Ravengard. Does her best to look at things in a non-judgemental way.

FlamingFist_003.synopsis: Flaming Fist Rahir is a stern solider who admires Duke Ravengard. He is tough and nonense.

Arrival.synopsis: Standing on a dock, the Player's just arrived back in Haven after escaping Moonrise Towers with a boat of prisoners seeking sanctuary. A surprised Harper greets you and says he'll need to test the new arrivals.
Arrival.how_to_trigger: -Use Debug Book to teleport to Act 2 -> Haven -> Outside checkpoint.- Go through checkpoint dialogue and enter Haven.- Walk to dock underneath the inn.- Use oe command oe prisonersreturn to spawn Harper and prisoners

AD_Gnome02Inspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_Gnome02Inspection.how_to_trigger: click on the character as they're being inspected

AD_Inspection.synopsis: ADs before and after the Harper at the docks inspects the gnomes/tieflings rescued from Moonrise jail. He's affable, but a little wary.
AD_Inspection.how_to_trigger: -Use Debug Book to teleport to Act 2 -> Haven -> Outside checkpoint.- Go through checkpoint dialogue and enter Haven.- Walk to dock underneath the inn.- Use oe command oe prisonersreturn to spawn Harper and prisoners.- Click through dialog and observe ADs

FlamingFist_004.synopsis: A mercenary with the Flaming Fist, stuck in Haven with the refugees and one too pleased about it.

ArrivalInspector.synopsis: The Harper Inspecter is either looking over a batch of prisoners who've just arrived in Moonrise or has just finished inspecting them and is walking away when the player intercepts him. A gruff and suspicious guard.
ArrivalInspector.how_to_trigger: -Use Debug Book to teleport to Act 2 -> Haven -> Outside checkpoint.- Go through checkpoint dialogue and enter Haven.- Walk to dock underneath the inn.- Use oe command oe prisonersreturn to spawn Harper and prisoners- Go through the arrival dialog. When the dialog ends and the Harper starts to inspect the prisoners, speak to him.

FlamingFist_005.synopsis: One of the flaming fists in Haven. Resting after an expedition to SCL.

AD_Gnome01Inspection.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
AD_Gnome01Inspection.how_to_trigger: click on the character as they're being inspected

AD_LoverInspection_0.speaker: Danis
AD_LoverInspection_0.text: We have to worry about parasites now? Gods.

FlamingFist_006_0.speaker: Fist Cyril
FlamingFist_006_0.text: I'd offer to help, but with Duke Ravengard missing, we can't spare anyone. I'm sorry.
FlamingFist_006_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: sincere and emotive - you care deeply and are worried for the player's loved ones

FlamingFist_006_1.speaker: Fist Cyril
FlamingFist_006_1.text: I knew Marcus well - never suspected a thing.
FlamingFist_006_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: blaming yourself for not seeing the signs

FlamingFist_006_2.speaker: Fist Cyril
FlamingFist_006_2.text: If you're poking around this gods-forsaken place, you must have someone in Moonrise, too. Hope you find them.
FlamingFist_006_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: sincere and emotive - you care deeply and are worried for the player's loved ones

FlamingFist_006_3.speaker: Fist Cyril
FlamingFist_006_3.text: Maybe we could've helped him. Marcus, I mean. Before... you know.
FlamingFist_006_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: looking away on the last line - marcus, your friend, is dead

AD_BrotherInspection_0.speaker: Danis
AD_BrotherInspection_0.text: I would tell you if I had one, I swear it!

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_0.speaker: Manip Vidor
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_0.text: J'ehlar is doing her best, but he shows no signs of waking.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_3.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_3.text: If you have an alternative in mind, please do propose it.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_4.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_4.text: Patience. He may know a way through the curse.
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_4.context: NodeContext: Start with a sigh, letting anger dissipate.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_13.speaker: Manip Vidor
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_13.text: We don't even know if he'll ever recover.
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_13.context: NodeContext: Doubtful - the 'he' is a catatonic Flaming Fist nearby, being treated by a medic. He's a stranger to these characters, but they're hoping he cna help if he recovers

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_9.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_9.text: But we do know that anyone who goes charging into those shadows is dead.
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_9.context: NodeContext: strong emphasis on the 'do'. Arguing against somebody proposing action when she'd rather be making careful plans

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_10.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_10.text: She wants the same thing we do. To save the city.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_8.speaker: Manip Vidor
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_8.text: But she doesn't care if the Grand Duke lives or dies.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_2.speaker: Manip Vidor
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_2.text: I wouldn't go that far. But her focus is on stopping the cult, and I suspect she'd sacrifice anyone to achieve that.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_7.speaker: Manip Vidor
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_7.text: So the plan is to do nothing? Let the Duke rot in prison while Baldur's Gate burns?

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_12.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_12.text: Far from it. We need a way into the Towers. I intend to find one.
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_12.context: NodeContext: Irritated. Vidor has spoken disrespectfully.

AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_11.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_11.text: What I won't do is send any more of our people into the curse.
AD_ArguingWithFlorrick_11.context: NodeContext: Speaking through teeth, holding back anger.

AD_WulbrenInspection_0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_WulbrenInspection_0.text: This is ridiculous - as if I'd let some parasite infect me.
AD_WulbrenInspection_0.context: NodeContext: Loathing in his voice at the thought

FlirtyTiefling_0.speaker: Lakrissa
FlirtyTiefling_0.text: The light - it's happening. Ketheric is about to get a long overdue arse-kicking - I can feel it.

FlirtyTiefling_1.speaker: Lakrissa
FlirtyTiefling_1.text: Things in Moonrise were... bad. Real bad. Thank you - for getting me out of there.
FlirtyTiefling_1.context: NodeContext: usually cheery lakrissa is a bit more restrained here - still smiling but looking a little haunted

FlirtyTiefling_2.speaker: Lakrissa
FlirtyTiefling_2.text: You ever need a hand, you'll have me at your back - whether you like it or not.
FlirtyTiefling_2.context: NodeContext: smiling - half a threat half a joke

FlirtyTiefling_3.speaker: Lakrissa
FlirtyTiefling_3.text: Whoever, or whatever, is causing that light is on our side, I have no doubt.

Manip_0.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_0.text: You're on the right track with Flame Cullagh. He might be some use to us after all.

Manip_2.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_2.text: Looks like the stump had some life in him yet - well done.

Manip_13.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_13.context: NodeContext: hint of sarcasm, but just a hint

Manip_1.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_1.text: I can see that. But progress is progress.

Manip_22.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_22.text: You've got a long road ahead of you yet. I wish you luck.

Manip_19.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_19.text: I answer to Florrick. And she's told me to stand guard.

Manip_3.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_3.text: Heard you're meant to be heading toward the Towers.

Manip_25.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_25.text: With a single word, Florrick could charge the Coast's most powerful force with taking back the Grand Duke.

Manip_5.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_5.text: We ought to be doing just that. Not babysitting this stump.
Manip_5.context: NodeContext: bitter edge in his voice

Manip_7.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_7.text: 'A good soldier knows when he isn't the man for the job.' So sayeth Florrick.
Manip_7.context: NodeContext: With a bit of a bitter edge. He's not super pissed, but isn't happy.

Manip_16.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_16.text: If you find us a way into the Towers, we'll be there, shield to shield. Until then... we wait.

Manip_17.speaker: Player
Manip_17.text: Heard you're working on a way in yourselves.

Manip_24.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_24.text: Not sure I'd call it that myself. This fellow's in no condition to help anyone.

Manip_21.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_21.text: That makes you our best bet. Hope it's a good one.

Manip_20.speaker: Player
Manip_20.text: That's right - but I've heard this bedridden fellow might be able to help.

Manip_10.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_10.text: I'm not as hopeful as Florrick. For my money, we're better off strategising without him.

Manip_4.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_4.text: I'd rather lend you my blade, but you'll have to make do with my luck.

Manip_8.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_8.text: Don't let me hold you up. You've got a curse to clear.

Manip_12.speaker: Manip Vidor
Manip_12.text: Looks like you might actually finish what we couldn't. I'm impressed.

AD_SisterInspection_0.speaker: Lia
AD_SisterInspection_0.text: Can we hurry this up? I need a drink. Now.
AD_SisterInspection_0.context: NodeContext: annoyed and a little nervous

AD_FlamingFist_003_InCombat_0.speaker: Fist Rahir
AD_FlamingFist_003_InCombat_0.context: NodeContext: battle cry - determined and unafraid despite being outnumbered

FlamingFist_001_0.speaker: Fist Thadwick
FlamingFist_001_0.text: This is no place for amateurs.
FlamingFist_001_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: now annoyed that player is talking again

FlamingFist_001_1.speaker: Fist Thadwick
FlamingFist_001_1.text: The cultists are among us, and you want to chat? Let the professionals handle this.
FlamingFist_001_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: incredulous - you just repelled an attack

FlamingFist_001_2.speaker: Fist Thadwick
FlamingFist_001_2.text: We're discussing Fist business - and you're no Fist.
FlamingFist_001_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: annoyed and condescending

FlamingFist_001_3.speaker: Fist Thadwick
FlamingFist_001_3.text: Infected and a busybody? Why Jaheira let you in is beyond me.
FlamingFist_001_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: frustrated sigh

AD_FlamingFist_001_CouncillorDefeated_0.speaker: Fist Thadwick
AD_FlamingFist_001_CouncillorDefeated_0.text: The Cousellor's fallen - Fists, don't give up!

AD_FlirtyInspection_0.speaker: Lakrissa
AD_FlirtyInspection_0.text: These Flaming Fists don't take themselves half seriously, do they?
AD_FlirtyInspection_0.context: NodeContext: a cheeky smile - she's joking

AD_FlamingFist_006_InCombat_0.speaker: Fist Cyril
AD_FlamingFist_006_InCombat_0.context: NodeContext: in combat - fierce and determined

FlamingFist_002_0.speaker: Fist Aubree
FlamingFist_002_0.text: I've heard the stories about Moonrise. I hope the Duke is all right.
FlamingFist_002_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: concerned

FlamingFist_002_1.speaker: Fist Aubree
FlamingFist_002_1.text: Marcus was scum. But the rest of us are loyal to Duke Ravengard, loyal to Baldur's Gate, I swear it.
FlamingFist_002_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: worried the player thinks less of the flaming fist

FlamingFist_002_2.speaker: Fist Aubree
FlamingFist_002_2.text: An extra blade could be the difference between rescuing Duke Ravengard or losing him forever. I hope you'll help us.
FlamingFist_002_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Sincere

FlamingFist_002_3.speaker: Fist Aubree
FlamingFist_002_3.text: Duke Ravengard is more than our leader, he's family. I can't believe one of us would betray him.
FlamingFist_002_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: you can't believe someone could even THINK of betraying your organisation - it's everything to you

FlamingFist_003_0.speaker: Fist Rahir
FlamingFist_003_0.text: Nothing to be done here. The Duke's in the Towers.
FlamingFist_003_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: strict but coming from a good place

FlamingFist_003_1.speaker: Fist Rahir
FlamingFist_003_1.text: I've known Marcus for years, to think he would turn on us - on me... you did well to defend Isobel.
FlamingFist_003_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: distracted, dissapointed in yourself for not seeing the signs, but still trying to encourage the player

FlamingFist_003_2.speaker: Fist Rahir
FlamingFist_003_2.text: You're heading into the Towers, are you? Good. I pray it's not too late for Duke Ravengard.
FlamingFist_003_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Stern

FlamingFist_003_3.speaker: Fist Rahir
FlamingFist_003_3.text: We rid ourselves of a traitor, but also someone I once called friend. Leave me in peace, please.
FlamingFist_003_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Annoyed - you want to mourn in peace

Arrival_1.speaker: Narrator
Arrival_1.text: *Your journey through the darkness has brought you to land, at last.*
Arrival_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Screen is black. As the narration ends, it fades up to reveal players and prisoners standing on the dock with the Harper walking towards them

Arrival_26.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_26.text: I don't know who you are, but you're coming with me. The Commander will want a word.

Arrival_27.speaker: Narrator
Arrival_27.text: *You drift through the dark until time, skill, or luck brings you to Last Light's dock.*
Arrival_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Screen is black. As the narration ends, it fades up to reveal players and prisoners standing on the dock with the Harper walking towards them

Arrival_12.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_12.text: Hold there! You can't just land and start unloading strangers - there are procedures, damn it.

Arrival_5.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_5.text: No one gets in without being tested - Commander Jaheira's orders.

Arrival_16.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_16.text: We'll process this lot, but you need to come with me. The Commander will want a word.

Arrival_30.speaker: Player
Arrival_30.text: We just escaped the Absolute - these people need sanctuary, not 'procedures'.

Arrival_33.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_33.text: And they'll have it, once we know they're free from infection.

Arrival_15.speaker: Player
Arrival_15.text: Jaheira ordered all Harpers to let me come and go as needed.

Arrival_25.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_25.text: The commander cleared you, not your friends.

Arrival_7.speaker: Player
Arrival_7.text: I passed your damn test already. I remember the vines vividly.

Arrival_21.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_21.text: You did, but your friends did not.

Arrival_24.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_24.text: Anyone could be infected, so we're checking all new faces. No exceptions.

Arrival_0.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_0.text: Here, form a line. Let's see if the Absolute's little pet recognises any of you.
Arrival_0.context: NodeContext: Spoken to the escapees from the boat

Arrival_18.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Arrival_18.text: The Absolute's what? What are you doing?

Arrival_34.speaker: Player
Arrival_34.text: He only wants to see if you're infected. It's safe, I promise.

Arrival_13.speaker: Player
Arrival_13.text: Just do as he says. Trust me, this is the easy way.

Arrival_3.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_3.text: If what you've said is true, no one has anything to fear.

Arrival_19.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_19.text: If not - well, we'll soon find out.

Arrival_29.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_29.text: Now, form a line. I'll not ask again.

Arrival_10.speaker: Player
Arrival_10.text: You didn't think you'd escaped, did you? No one escapes the Absolute.

Arrival_28.speaker: Harper Arthus
Arrival_28.text: Enough playing, True Soul. It's time to see what you've brought us.

Arrival_6.speaker: Nimble
Arrival_6.text: The Absolute's what? You lost your mind?

Arrival_9.speaker: Nickels
Arrival_9.text: The what? You - you ain't serious?

Arrival_11.speaker: Lia
Arrival_11.text: The Absolute's what? What are you talking about?

Arrival_32.speaker: Danis
Arrival_32.text: The Absolute's - what are you talking about?

Arrival_17.speaker: Lakrissa
Arrival_17.text: The Absolute's pet? Tell me you're joking.

AD_Gnome02Inspection_0.speaker: Nickels
AD_Gnome02Inspection_0.text: I want to go inside - to the wood and stone. Where it's quiet - safe.

AD_FlamingFist_005_InCombat_0.speaker: Fist Gretta
AD_FlamingFist_005_InCombat_0.text: The Flaming Fist bow to no one.
AD_FlamingFist_005_InCombat_0.context: NodeContext: in combat - fearless and determined

AD_Inspection_0.speaker: Harper Arthus
AD_Inspection_0.text: That's it, this won't take long.

AD_Inspection_1.speaker: Harper Arthus
AD_Inspection_1.text: And you're clear. Welcome to Last Light.

FlamingFist_004_0.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_0.text: A hundred years locked away inside a curse - can you imagine?
FlamingFist_004_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

FlamingFist_004_1.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_1.text: Halsin will come, won't he? Seems like he's the key to all of this.

FlamingFist_004_2.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_2.text: I'll say a prayer to Tymora - for your good luck. A copper to the Lady returns tenfold in gold - and maybe something that'll help you and Halsin, too.

FlamingFist_004_4.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_4.text: We kept Art safe - that's what matters. Couldn't have done it without you.
FlamingFist_004_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FlamingFist_004_5.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_5.text: I knew Art had suffered, but I didn't realise the extent of it. And there's a child lost in the shadows still. I hope you can help him.

FlamingFist_004_6.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_6.text: You can help him, can't you? He deserves a life, after all he's been through.
FlamingFist_004_6.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

FlamingFist_004_7.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_7.text: He's looking well, isn't he? You've done so much for him. Thank you.

FlamingFist_004_9.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_9.text: He looks a little better, doesn't he? Art, that is.
FlamingFist_004_9.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FlamingFist_004_10.speaker: Fist J'ehlar
FlamingFist_004_10.text: This is him - Halsin, right? The one Art's been asking for.

ArrivalInspector_0.speaker: Harper Arthus
ArrivalInspector_0.text: Keep your distance. Let's not confuse the parasite.

FlamingFist_005_0.speaker: Fist Gretta
FlamingFist_005_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: solemn

FlamingFist_005_1.speaker: Fist Gretta
FlamingFist_005_1.text: Good work rooting out the traitor.
FlamingFist_005_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: 'the traitor' was a cultist disguised as a flaming fist that the player killed

FlamingFist_005_2.speaker: Fist Gretta
FlamingFist_005_2.text: Nice to see a friendly face come out of the shadows for once.
FlamingFist_005_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

FlamingFist_005_3.speaker: Fist Gretta
FlamingFist_005_3.text: That parasite of yours could prove useful. Until it kills you.
FlamingFist_005_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: second sentence delivered grimly - it's not a joke

AD_Gnome01Inspection_0.speaker: Nimble
AD_Gnome01Inspection_0.text: This is a waste of time - I certainly don't have one.
